text: Bad Kreuznach is a district in Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. The region made by this district and the adjoining Birkenfeld district is known as the Naheland. == Towns and municipalities == Verband-free towns #Bad Kreuznach Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden *1.
